title: greeting
text: Hello, nice to meet you, I am JOBOT. I am here to help you find your dream job!

children.title: field
children.text: Select a field for job

children.title: user selected 'other' field
children.text: Sorry, there is not a job to offer you. Would you like us to save your details for future services?

children.title: user agreed to save his details
children.text: Thank you for visiting our site. For more information click here

children.title: user refused to save his details
children.text: Thank you for visiting our site. For more information click here

children.title: user selected fields
children.text: Select a job title at this field (Multiple jobs)

children.title: user selected job titles
children.text: Great! Do you have any specific companies that you would like to work at? (Multiple companies)

children.title: user selected specific companies
children.text: Excellent, we will consider priority for these companies

children.title: next question
children.text: In which areas are you interested?

children.title: user selected areas
children.text: Excellent, we will consider priority for these areas

children.title: next question
children.text: Select job types

children.title: jobs scanning
children.text: Just a moment please, I'm looking for relevant jobs for you

children.title: display appropriate jobs
children.text: Please select appropriate jobs

children.title: first time the user has selected 'Nothing fits'
children.text: Just a moment please, I'm looking for relevant jobs again

children.title: second time the user has selected 'Nothing fits'
children.text: Would you like to see jobs with an accurate match?

children.title: user refused to an accurate match
children.text: Why don't you want offers anymore? (Type in terms of easy/difficult navigation, simplicity of the system, displaying jobs)

children.title: send to self job search
children.text: Ok, you have an opportunity to self job search from our jobs pool here

children.title: goodbye
children.text: It was a pleasure to assist you. Thank you!

children.title: user agreed to an accurate match
children.text: Select the accuracy level (Multiple choice)

children.title: user selected 'other' level of accuracy
children.text: Ok, you have an opportunity to self job search from our jobs pool here

children.title: goodbye
children.text: It was a pleasure to assist you. Thank you!
